content: The Loongwreathe Staff is a Epic weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with great stats, damage, and a solid unique effect if you use the Pillar Stance. It is one of the best Weapons in the early-to-mid game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loongwreathe_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Loongwreathe Staff'.
The content is as follows:
The Loongwreathe Staff is a Epic weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with great stats, damage, and a solid unique effect if you use the Pillar Stance. It is one of the best Weapons in the early-to-mid game.
